review_data.title: Super Lebanese food and experience
review_data.content: It is really excellent I went already 3 times It is the best restaurant for Lebanese that I have experienced outside Lebanon. The plates are abundant the prices reasonable and the service genuinely courteous as you would expect from Lebanese caterers. A very pleasant experience...More

review_data.title: Preis-Leistung klasse
review_data.content: Für Schweizer(Züricher)Verhältnisse sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. leckeres Essen, netter Service

review_data.title: Best meal so far in this country
review_data.content: Since living here I have found the food quality in Switzerland as a whole very disappointing but after coming here to Al Mouchtars I am delighted to say not all restaurants are bad. The establishment was spotless, staff extremely friendly and food just bloody tasty.highly...More

review_data.title: Zum empfehlen
review_data.content: Sehr feine Essen und sehr freundliche Personal und Besitzer Feine Schisha Der Preis ist super angenehm Ist wirklich zu empfehlen

review_data.title: Sehr lecker
review_data.content: Schönes restaurant mit qualitativ hochwertigen libanesischen Speisen. Shawarma mix kann ich wärmstens empfehlen.

review_data.title: New place just opened, great food, fast service
review_data.content: This restaurant just opened in Glattbrugg/Opfikon, replacing the Levante. Same menu and concept as in Zurich, Winterthur and St. Gallen. Mixed grill plate for 17.- CHF, a lot of sandwiches (around 8-10 CHF), shisha on request. Nice seating place outside and very friendly staff. Good...More
